settings.name: Radius for cluster search
settings.description: Define the radius (in meter) for searching for GPS locations and cluster formation.

settings.name: Time window used for cluster formation
settings.description: Provide the maximum time duration (in days) that animals spend at a cluster. Defaults to 3 (days).

settings.name: Minimum location used for clustering
settings.description: Minimum lcoation to be used to differentiate between cluster and non-clusters (Den sites, resting lcoations). A higher minimum location for cluster ensures the animal has came back and spend some time in the cluster radius within the number of window days provided.
